[7. Leonard B - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Confirm Beauchemin has not personally run a G550 192-month inspection since the model’s release.

[7. Leonard B - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Q: You haven’t managed a G550 inspection since that model entered service?

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]
Confirm that Craig was directly copied on development and circulation of July 2023 downtime modeling presentations.

Acknowledge rudder delay persisted into late April or May despite Aircraft input in January.

[6. Patrick Stockton - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]

[6. Patrick Stockton - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
Acknowledge familiarity with this Aircraft’s paint scheme and history.

[6. Patrick Stockton - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]

[6. Patrick Stockton - Cross Exam & Impeachment.docx, p.1]
The mismatch was so pronounced that it required rework and further delayed the Aircraft’s return to service.
